thread.title: Hilarious moment Donald Trump boasts 'we don't make mistakes' then makes embarrassing gaffe
thread.title_full: Hilarious moment Donald Trump boasts 'we don't make mistakes' then makes embarrassing gaffe

author: Steve Robson
title: Hilarious moment Donald Trump boasts 'we don't make mistakes' then makes embarrassing gaffe
text:
Hilarious moment Donald Trump boasts 'we don't make mistakes' then makes embarrassing gaffe The President was meeting police leaders when he gave critics another chance to lampoon him Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Trump says he can't make a mistake...before IMMEDIATELY making a mistake Share this video Get politics updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Donald Trump's sense of comic timing was immaculate. 
At a meeting with police leaders he raged about the scrutiny his presidency has come under but boasted: "We don't make mistakes" 
He then turned to one of the police union leaders and said: "Go ahead Ken" 
Unfortunately, the man then introduced himself as Chuck Canterbury, the National President of the Fraternal Order of the Police. 
Officials said Trump, who has hailed himself as a 'law and order' President, discussed gun violence, the drug epidemic and attacks on police during the meeting. 
He highlighted violence in Chicago where there were 720 murders last year, the highest in 20 years. Like us on Facebook
